extendedInfo.description: If you are Diddy's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Diddy's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Diddy's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Diddy's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - No Way Out- Forever- The Saga Continues...- We Invented the Remix- Press Play- Last Train to Paris-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - After Love- All Night Long- Angels- Angels With Dirty Faces- Ass On The Floor- Back For Good Now- Bad Boy For Life- Bad Boy For Life (Remix)- Been Around The World- Best Friend- Blast Off- Can't Believe- Can't Nobody Hold Me Down- Change- Child Of The Ghetto- Claim My Place (Interlude)- Come To Me- Coming Home- Crazy Thang (Interlude)- Dance With Me (Remix) / Peaches & Cream (Remix)- Diddy- Diddy Rock- Do You Know?- Do You Like It, Do You Want It- Don't Stop What You're Doing- Everything I Love- Fake Thugs Dedication- Friends- Gangsta Shit- Hate You Now- Hello Good Morning- Hold Up- I Am (Interlude)- I Got The Power- I Hate That You Love Me- I Hear Voices- I Know- I Love You Baby- I Need A Girl (Part One)- I Need A Girl (Part Two)- I Need A Girl (To Bella)- If I Should Die Tonight (Interlude)- If You Want This Money- I'll Be Missing You- I'll Do This For You- Intro- Is This The End?- Is This The End? (Part Two)- It's All About The Benjamins (Remix)- Journey Through The Life- Last Night- Last Night (Part 2)- Let's Get It- Lonely- Lookin' For Love- Loving You No More- Making It Hard- No More Drama (Remix)- No Way Out (Intro)- Notorious B.I.G. (Remix)- On Top- Pain- Partners For Life- PE 2000- Real Niggas- Reverse- Roll With Me- Satisfy You- Senorita- Shades- So Complete- So Complete (Remix)- Someone To Love Me- Special Delivery (Remix)- Special Feeling- Strobe Lights- Tell Me- Testimonial (Intro)- That's Crazy- That's Crazy (Remix)- The Future- The Last Song- The Saga Continues- Thought You Said- Through The Pain (She Told Me)- Unfoolish- Victory- Wanna Move- We Gon' Make It- What You Gonna Do?- What You Want- Where's Sean?- Woke Up In The Morning (Remix)- Yeah Yeah You Would- Yesterday- You Gets No Love (Remix)- Young G's- Your Love
